text: The Škoda Felicia was a automobile produced by Škoda Auto. It replaced the Favorit in 1994 with a facelift in 1998. Its successor, Škoda Fabia, was introduced in 1999, but the Felicia still continued until 2001 in estate form until it was replaced by the Fabia version. == Versions == File:1997.skoda.felicia.gli.1point9d.arp.jpg|5-door hatchback (Felicia) File:Skoda Felicia front 20071109.jpg|5-door station wagon (Felicia Combi) File:Brno, Sedlákova, Škoda Felicia Vanplus.jpg|5-door panel van (Felicia Vanplus) File:Skoda Felicia Pickup.jpg|2-door pickup truck (Felicia Pickup) == Engines == * 1.3 40 kW (54 hp) and 50 kW (68 hp) * 1.6 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.9 D 47 kW (64 hp) Felicia Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Škoda Felicia
